name: NanosUtils
description: A table containing useful and aux functions

static_functions.name: IsA
static_functions.description: Returns if an object is a type

return.description: the type of the object corresponds

static_functions.name: Dump
static_functions.description: Dumps a table into a readable text

static_functions.name: Benchmark
static_functions.description: Benchmarks a function performance, outputs in the console the elapsed time

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: The arguments of the function to call

static_functions.name: FormatString
static_functions.description: A better string.format, replace {num} by the corresponding vararg in a string

return.description: the final text with the arguments
